original: Saraṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: saraṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Saraṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: saraṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā araṇam bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve
